EmailTemplate.name: NRRC_New_AD_Account_Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Subject: Notification of New Active Directory Account
Dear Active Directory Administrator,
Greetings,
Please be informed that a new user account has been created automatically by the Identity and Access Management (IAM) System. Kindly review the account details and ensure compliance with security policies:
Name: $identityFullname Department: $identityDepartment Mobile Number: $identityPhone Email Address: $identityEmail AD Account Name: $identityADAccount AD Account Temperary Password: $identityADTempPassword
Thank you for your cooperation.
This notification was automatically generated by the IAM System.
EmailTemplate.Subject: Notification of New Active Directory Account - $identityFullname
